phase3.gui.ProgressDialog



class ProgressDialog: org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell.Shell;
A simple dialog which displays a ProgressBar.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 21, 2014

this(Shell parent);
Creates a new ProgressDialog.

Params:
Shell parent The parent Shell of this dialog.

Date:
April 21, 2014

void setProgress(int progress);
Sets the progress of the ProgressBar.

Params:
int progress The progress (from 0 - 1000) of the ProgressBar.

April 21, 2014
